Children.Title: Answer
Children.Tooltip: Tell him you don't know where you are, or why.

Children.Title: North
Children.Tooltip: Say that you come from the far, cold North, from where many thick-furred races hail.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Thank him and say you want a minute to breathe.

Children.Title: Deny
Children.Tooltip: Explain that you don't think that's the case.

Children.Title: Step outside
Children.Tooltip: The world is out there, waiting...
Children.ScriptAction:
LogSplit()
Log("TOWN_FIRST_FOX_LEAVE4")
Log("TOWN_MARKET_DAY")
Log("TOWN_MARKET")
Log("WELCOME", Color.Gray)
Journal.Update("MQ01", 10)
SetInventoryEnabled(true)

Children.Title: Avoid
Children.Tooltip: Explain that, having lost your memory, you cannot be sure.

Children.Title: Finmer
Children.Tooltip: Ask him to tell you more about this place.

Children.Title: Fox
Children.Tooltip: Ask who he is, and why he's helping you.

Children.Title: Alleyway
Children.Tooltip: Ask how he managed to find you.

Children.Title: East
Children.Tooltip: Say that you come from the modest East, where many cultures live interspersed.

Children.Title: South
Children.Tooltip: Say that you come from the balmy South, where the centers of commerce lie.

Children.ScriptAction:
-- advance the clock to make it night (9 PM or later)
local hour = GetTimeHour()
if hour < 21 then
    AdvanceTime(21 - hour)
end

Storage.SetFlag("town_market_postmq02_event", true)
SetInventoryEnabled(false)
Log("MARKET_MQ02_BEGIN")

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Best not let this chance slip away.

Children.Title: Run
Children.Tooltip: [Body] Try to catch up with the mysterious figure

Children.Title: Throw Weapon
Children.Tooltip: [Strength] Try throwing your weapon at them
Children.ScriptAppear:
-- cannot throw claws, and throwing a massive axe or some shit is ridiculous
local wt = Player.PrimaryWeapon.WeaponType
return wt == WeaponType.Light or wt == WeaponType.OneHanded

Children.Title: Grab
Children.Tooltip: Got them right where you want them.

Children.Title: Question
Children.Tooltip: Ask her how she knows your name.

Children.Title: Deny
Children.Tooltip: Say that you don't want anything to do with that guy.

Children.Title: Relent
Children.Tooltip: Might as well. You don't think she's got anywhere to run.

Children.Title: Who
Children.Tooltip: Ask her who she is.

Children.Title: You
Children.Tooltip: Ask her who you are to her.

Children.Title: Spying
Children.Tooltip: Ask why she was spying on you.

Children.Title: Bridge
Children.Tooltip: Ask her to tell you more about the 'bridge case'.

Children.Title: Memory
Children.Tooltip: Inquire about your memory loss. Does she know anything about it?

Children.Title: What now?
Children.Tooltip: What's going to happen now?

Children.Title: Confirm
Children.Tooltip: Explain what happened, and that Oliver is fine, if a bit shaken.

Children.Title: Plan
Children.Tooltip: What's the plan moving forward?

Children.Title: Lie
Children.Tooltip: Loosely explain what happened, and that Randall got rid of Oliver.

Children.Title: Dodge
Children.Tooltip: Evade the question. Ask her why she was spying on you.

Children.Title: Confirm
Children.Tooltip: Claim that you are, in fact, part of the Red Maw.

Children.Title: Intimidate
Children.Tooltip: Tell her not to try any funny business.

Children.Title: Devour
Children.Tooltip: You can't help but drool all over that delicious-looking face.
Children.ScriptAction:
-- jeez, do you really have to try and eat everything? fatty

Storage.SetFlag("iso_freed_from_you", false)
Storage.SetFlag("iso_enemy", true)

local snack = Creature("Town_Iso")
Combat.AddCombatant(snack)
Combat.SetGrappling(Player, snack, true)
Combat.SetPinned(Player, snack, true)
Combat.OnRoundEnd(function()
    -- if player doesn't have a hold of Iso, she flees
    local grab = snack:IsGrappling()
    local gulp = snack:IsBeingSwallowed() or snack:IsEaten()
    if not grab and not gulp then
        Storage.SetFlag("iso_freed_from_you", true)
        Combat.Interrupt()
    end
end)
Combat.OnCharacterKilled(function(killer, target)
    
end)
Combat.Begin()

-- need to clean up after Interrupt()
Combat.Reset()

Children.Title: Pull Down
Children.Tooltip: [Agility] Try to grab on to them and pull them back down

Children.Title: Search
Children.Tooltip: [Wits] Forgo the chase, and instead look for anything left behind

Children.Title: Abandon
Children.Tooltip: It's good enough that you noticed them.
Children.ScriptAppear:
-- disabled as of v0.5
return false

Children.ScriptAction:
-- Randomize the guard's species
guard = GetRandomCharacter()

-- Remember this encounter
Storage.SetFlag("law_ever_arrested", true)
Storage.SetFlag("law_arrested_naked", true)

SetInventoryEnabled(false)
Text.SetContext("guard", guard)
Log("EVENT_NAKED_BEGIN")

Children.Title: Apologize
Children.Tooltip: You'll, uh, make sure it doesn't happen again.

Children.Title: Gllrrk!
Children.ScriptAction:
Log("TOWN_GUARD_VORE_WIN_POV")

-- Non-fatal
guard.PredatorDigests = false
guard.Flags = ECharacterFlags.SkipTurns

-- Start a combat with the player in the guard's belly
local state = Combat2()
state:AddParticipant(Player)
state:AddParticipant(guard)
state:SetVored(guard, Player)
state:OnRoundEnd(function(round)
    -- Print some sexy text and release after some rounds
    Text.SetContext("guard", guard)
    Log("TOWN_GUARD_POSTVORE" .. round)
    if round >= 5 then
        state:End()
    end
end)
state:Begin()

-- Take a fine, and make sure the player has clothes now
Player.Money = math.max(Player.Money - 10, 0)
if not Player:HasItem("A_ClothArmor") then
    Player:GiveItem("A_ClothArmor", true)
end

-- Context was discarded (scene change) so we need to reset it now
Text.SetContext("guard", guard)

Log("TOWN_GUARD_REGURGITATED")

Children.Title: Defy
Children.Tooltip: Make a corny sex joke.

Children.ScriptAction:
AddLink(ECompass.North, "Scene_TownNSQ")
AddLink(ECompass.West, "Scene_TownWSQ")
AddLink(ECompass.South, "Scene_TownGate")
SetLocation("Town, Marketplace")
SetInventoryEnabled(true)

Children.Title: Inn
Children.Tooltip: Visit the town's local public house.

Children.Title: Fish Stall
Children.Tooltip: They sell fish in a fishing village, who knew?
Children.ScriptAction:
-- done here and not in the following States, because the conversation returns to those nodes as roots
Log(Storage.GetFlag("town_market_fish_first") and "TOWN_MARKET_FISH_HELLO" or "TOWN_MARKET_FISH_FIRST")
Storage.SetFlag("town_market_fish_first", true)

Children.Title: Work
Children.Tooltip: Ask the fox if he knows any leads for work.

Children.ScriptAction:
local questgiver = Creature("CR_RandomAnthro")
questgiver.Alias = "Gabe"
questgiver.Gender = EGender.Male
Text.SetContext("questgiver", questgiver)
Log("MQ01_SETUP1")

Children.Title: Bridge
Children.Tooltip: Ask how a trade route could just collapse like that.

Children.Title: Acting Mayor
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he meant by 'acting' mayor.

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: Thank him for the information.

Children.Title: Chat
Children.Tooltip: Ask the fox how business is.

Children.Title: Buy
Children.ScriptAction:
local shop = Shop("MarketFish")
shop.Title = "Gabe's Fish Stand"
shop.StringGroup = "SHOP_GENERIC_"
shop.RestockInterval = 24
if shop.NeedsRestock then
    shop.NeedsRestock = false
    shop:RemoveDefaultStock()
    shop:AddItem(Item("U_FoodFish1Raw"), -1)
    shop:AddItem(Item("U_FoodFish1Cooked"), -1)
    shop:AddItem(Item("U_FoodLemon"), -1)
end
shop:Show()
shop:Save()

Children.Title: Fruit Stall
Children.Tooltip: And fruit & veggies too, apparently, if you're into that sort of thing.

Children.Title: Buy
Children.ScriptAction:
local shop = Shop("MarketFruit")
shop.Title = "Fresh Foods Stand"
shop.StringGroup = "SHOP_GENERIC_"
shop.RestockInterval = 24
if shop.NeedsRestock then
    shop.NeedsRestock = false
    shop:RemoveDefaultStock()
    shop:AddItem(Item("U_FoodBread"), -1)
    shop:AddItem(Item("U_FoodCheese"), -1)
    shop:AddItem(Item("U_FoodGrapes"), -1)
end
shop:Show()
shop:Save()
